oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The tetralithium derivative of the tetrakis(1-naphthylimido)silicate tetraanion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: COPSEY, MC
BALAKRISHNA, MS
CHIVERS, T
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: anions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The title compound, bis(diethyl ether-kappa O) tetra(tetrahydrofuran-kappa O)[mu 4-tetrakis(1-naphthylimido)silane(4-)] tetralithium( I) diethyl ether solvate, [Li-4(C40H28N4Si)(C4H8O)(4)(C4H10O)(2)](C4H10O)-C-., has been structurally characterized. The compound contains the tetrakis(naphthylimido) silicate tetraanion, which is formally isoelectronic with the orthosilicate anion, [SiO4](4-). The two halves of the molecule are equivalent, related by a crystallographic twofold rotation axis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: ACTA CRYSTALLOGRAPHICA SECTION E-STRUCTURE REPORTS ONLINE, 62(), M1680-M1682
